meanings.sent1: The small dog was shrimpier than the big one.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the shrimpier dress over the larger one.
meanings.sent3: The shrimpier sandwich looked like a tiny snack!
meanings.sent4: His shrimpier voice was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The shrimpier flowers in the garden stood out among the larger ones.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a shrimp.
meanings.sent1: The shrimpier dish had a strong seafood flavor.
meanings.sent2: Her shrimpier personality made her quite endearing.
meanings.sent3: He felt like a shrimpier version of himself after the long hike.
meanings.sent4: The shrimpier boat struggled to stay afloat in the rough waters.
meanings.sent5: The shrimpier building stood out among the modern skyscrapers.
